# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(qsql-example LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(qsql-example "")
set_target_properties(qsql-example PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "qsql-example")
set_target_properties(qsql-example PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(qsql-example PRIVATE
    .
)
target_include_directories(qsql-example SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/Users/dte/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/f/fmt/11.1.1/d77311531cfb4f8d8578f217a322c7c7/include
    C:/Users/dte/.conan2/p/b/libpq5ef2fbbbf4b6b/p/include
    C:/Users/dte/.conan2/p/b/libpq46578c491098c/p/include
    C:/Users/dte/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/s/sqlitecpp/3.3.2/e6fbae8bcc0c4463860caf64d1463071/include
)
target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(qsql-example PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(qsql-example PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(qsql-example PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET qsql-example PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(qsql-example PRIVATE
    fmt
    pqxx
    libpq
    libpgcommon
    libpgport
    sqlite3
    SQLiteCpp
    wsock32
    ws2_32
    secur32
    advapi32
    shell32
    crypt32
    wldap32
)
target_link_directories(qsql-example PRIVATE
    C:/Users/dte/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/f/fmt/11.1.1/d77311531cfb4f8d8578f217a322c7c7/lib
    C:/Users/dte/.conan2/p/b/libpq5ef2fbbbf4b6b/p/lib
    C:/Users/dte/.conan2/p/b/libpq46578c491098c/p/lib
    C:/Users/dte/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/s/sqlitecpp/3.3.2/e6fbae8bcc0c4463860caf64d1463071/lib
)
target_sources(qsql-example PRIVATE
    example/main.cpp
)

target_include_directories(qsql-test PRIVATE
    .
)

)

    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(qsql-test PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(qsql-test PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(qsql-test PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET qsql-test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()

    fmt
    pqxx
    libpq
    libpgcommon
    libpgport
    sqlite3
    SQLiteCpp
    gmock
    gtest
    wsock32
    ws2_32

    shell32
    crypt32
    wldap32
)
